name: Colony
description: Colony is a space exploration game where you fly around trying to colonize planets, battle alien races, collect resources, and save the human race!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1 gigahertz (GHz) or faster 32-bit (x86) Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 graphics device with WDDM 1.0 or higher driver. DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space
